name: CLARITY
description:
Insights from the Dreaming Pool - Lifting the veil. See through the mist. Allow it to clear and you will see. One after the other connect the dots and so it makes sense, now you understand. A clear feeling is coming about a particular issue. You just know it's the correct way forward, its the right thing to do for you. Others may be upset but in the long run it's better for them too. The feeling of clarity will keep you strong when you say no or take action to make whatever it is happen. This is what clarity does it cuts through all of the mist and you can see your way forward. The most important thing is to act now when the way is clear. Being able to see clearly is powerful and so will propel you forward and it's the easiest route. You can move quicker when you can see. Put the fear of the unknown out of your mind and follow the path doing what's best for you.


The Dreaming Pool Oracle is a collaboration between artists Maia Mellier 🕸(@maiamellier) & AEVIN (@aevin_io)
